price: (41) So the shriek[954] seized them in truth,[955] and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes:
[954]- See footnote to 11:67.
[955]- i.e., by right or in justice.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣayḥatu bil-ḥaqi fajaʿalnāhum ghuthāan fabuʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
